full_summary:
**Tender Announcement: Removal and Disposal of Garbage and Recyclable Materials**

**Reference Number:** WS4255946957
**Publication Date:** December 21, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** March 14, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) invites offers to provide a Hybrid Task Authorization (TA) Contract for the removal and disposal of dry and wet garbage, and recyclable materials for the Edmonton Garrison and its area of responsibility.

**Scope of Work:**

The successful contractor will be responsible for the supply of all labour, materials, and equipment necessary to perform the removal and disposal of garbage and recyclable materials for buildings and locations within the Edmonton Garrison and its area of responsibility, as outlined in the detailed Statement of Work.

**Contract Period:**

The contract will be valid for a period of three (3) years, with two (2) one (1) year option periods.

**Trade Agreements:**

This tender is open to all qualified contractors who are eligible to participate in the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement.

**Contact Information:**

For more information, please contact:

Matthew Havrilenko
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
matthew.havrilenko@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL:**

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18345378?extsite=MTgzNDUzNzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please note that all required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by March 14, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EDT will be considered non-responsive.  Word Count: 180
